item.description:
A fellow Meetup member, Elaine Gardner, www.healingjourneyma.com will be joining us!  She believes that a strong, healthy body removes physical distractions that may interfere with one’s ability to be their best and fully connect with their intuition.

Elaine writes, "Holistic Clinical Nutrition is a wonderful tool to uncover what weaknesses exist in the body and what whole food supplements you can use to strengthen and optimize your personal health. It also raises the vibrational energy of the body, increasing your own personal energy field in the process."

We will also have the opportunity to experience muscle testing!!

Bring enough food to feed at least four other people and be ready for a great time with like-minded people!
item.how_to_find_us: come to the upper porch and walk in the door!
item.name: Get the Scoop on the Right Foods for You!
